item.title: Beware of the ‘Ponzi funds’ that are hiding in plain sight, says strategist
item.description: The rise of thematic funds leads to Ponzi-like situations, say researchers.

item.title: I’m a 73-year-old widower who wants to take 6% out of my 401(k) instead of 4%. Can I afford it?
item.description: “I will receive $105,000 per year in retirement. I earn $135,000 a year now.”

item.title: ‘God works in mysterious ways’: I became a Nvidia millionaire playing ‘World of Warcraft.’ Am I smart — or just lucky?
item.description: “I had no job and no unemployment benefits.”

item.title: ‘I can’t deal with managing them’: I juggle 18 credit cards. How do I close them without ruining my credit score?
item.description: “I have very high limits, so charges barely make a blip on my credit-utilization ratio.”

item.title: ‘I’m at a loss’: My boyfriend of nearly 10 years is naming his elderly parents as his powers of attorney and his beneficiaries. Am I right to be upset?
item.description: “I own the house we live in and he pays me a small amount of rent every month to help cover my mortgage and utilities.”
